name: You will die a lot buddy, trust me!
name_original: You will die a lot buddy, trust me!
description:
A challenging platformer where you have to overcome obstacles. Avoid rays and spikes using the grappling gun. There are checkpoints for each room, so don't be afraid to die. And finally see your rank on the leaderboard at the end of game.


Details
-Lots of hard levels
-Lots of death
-Time and death counter
-Leaderboard
-Full controller support (Keyboard not recommended)
